project.name: BTC-Koii
project.description: Bitcoin mining pools on Koii Network

guidance.instruction: Only implement features specified in the plan documents. For anything not in the plan, suggest creating a plan_update.md in the appropriate phase directory.
Respect phase boundaries and do not modify files across different phase directories without explicit instruction.
Document code thoroughly and ensure all implementations reference the specific plan sections they fulfill.
Ensure tests validate both original requirements and any approved modifications.
When encountering technical obstacles, document them in a plan_update.md file with considered alternatives and chosen solutions.

prohibitedActions: Implementing features not in plan without documentation

toolConfig.initialization: When starting a session, read all directives in the /directives folder
toolConfig.suggestions: Only suggest implementations that conform to plan documents
toolConfig.completions: Include references to plan sections in code comments
toolConfig.codeGeneration: Validate all generated code against plan requirements
